sliderheader: Better Healthcare for a Better Life
pahrmacybody: Get your medicine and all your pharmacy needs
Teleconsultationbody: Teleconsultation Schedule a voice or video call with aspecialized doctor
choosespeciality: Choose the specialty, and the doctor will visit you athome.
offerscoronabody: You can ask and consult an internist about corona symptomsthrough a free call, sponsored by the Ministry of Health and Population, from 8 am to 12 am.
helthcarebody: Search and book a clinic visit, home visit, or a teleconsultation. Order your medicine and book a service or operation.
verfiedbody: Doctor ratings are from patients who booked and visited the doctor through Vezeeta.
bookingconfirmbody: Your booking is automatically confirmed, as the doctor specifies his working hours and is notified of the booking details.
bookfreehead: Book for free, and pay in the clinic
bookfreebody: The consultation fees stated on Vezeeta are the actual doctor's fees with no extra charges.
downloadbody: Search, compare and book doctor consultations with ease. Order your medicines & get them deilvered within 60 minutes. Track your steps count & earn points on hitting the daily goal
